leukapp.apps.core.db module¶

Custom fields and database-related code use across the leukapp project.

class CharNullField(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.fields.CharField

Subclass of the CharField that allows empty strings to be stored as NULL.

from_db_value(value, expression, connection, contex)[source]¶

Gets value right out of the db and changes it if its None.

to_python(value)[source]¶

Gets value right out of an instance, and changes it if its None.

get_prep_value(value)[source]¶

Catches value right before sending to db.
